183CFC31.Line7.10088C: This is Orton, my right-hand man. He'll accompany you. Handle this for me and maybe I'll happen upon more work in the future.

3FB9526F.Line5.10088C: If you could get it back, you'd be helping me out. And Backwater, of course.

6735A8AD.Line3.10088C: Last night bandits got into town and stole from the community stockpile. I'm still looking into how.

8EB1FEEB.Line1.10088C: I hear youâ€™ve been making yourself useful. Might have a job for you.

8FEF7E3C.VoiceDir5.10088C: friendly.  last sentence as an aftertought
